cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class FileStorageBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.FileStorageBackend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Backend, java.io.Serializable

    public class FileStorageBackend
extends java.lang.Object
implements Backend, java.io.Serializable
    The FileStorageBackend Class implements the Backend interface that provides functionality to store and retrieve information on disc.
    Author:
    Andrii Hlyvko
    See Also:
    Backend, Serialized Form

        public java.util.List<User> getUsers()

                                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        This method returns existing users as a list of user objects.

        Returns:
        List of users as a list of type user.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Gets thrown when there is an error opening the files.
